title: Never Forget

embed.description: Based on the hit webcomic Homestuck, Hiveswap is an episodic 3D point-and-click adventure game about a young human girl named Joey who gets sucked through a portal to the alien planet of Alternia. There she joins a band of scrappy troll rebels, and embarks on an epic journey to save the world and find a way home.

body: Homestuck is getting its own video game
